meanings.definition: The state of being unable to hear.
meanings.sent1: Her deafnesses made it hard for her to enjoy music concerts.
meanings.sent2: The doctor diagnosed him with severe deafnesses in both ears.
meanings.sent3: Despite his deafnesses, he could still feel the vibrations of the music.
meanings.sent4: The deafnesses in the room were so profound that even a pin drop could be heard.
meanings.sent5: The deafnesses in the forest at night were broken only by the hoot of an owl.

meanings.definition: The condition of lacking the sense of hearing.
meanings.sent1: The baby's deafnesses were discovered during a routine check-up.
meanings.sent2: She communicated with him through sign language due to his deafnesses.
meanings.sent3: His deafnesses led to some hilarious misunderstandings during conversations.
meanings.sent4: The deafnesses in the room were so complete that even shouting didn't help.
meanings.sent5: The profound deafnesses of the old radio made it impossible to hear any music.
